channel.title: Ear ringing sound Effect - Fix possible in player.cpp
channel.description:
Hello dear developers. Please me a favor and just set this to false: bool ear_ringing = distanceFromPlayer < MIN_EAR_RINGING_DISTANCE ? true : false; [url]https://github.com/ValveSoftware/source-sdk-2013/blob/master/sp/src/game/server/player.cpp[/url]
I and a lot of other people hate this sound effect. If you don't want to remove it, please make it an option :slight_smile:
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/app/4000/discussions/1/490123727974086656/[/url] [url]https://steamcommunity.com/app/320/discussions/0/598198173699323912/[/url] [url]https://facepunch.com/showthread.php?t=1355524[/url] [url]https://forums.alliedmods.net/showthread.php?p=2409439[/url]
Playing with multiplayer with this sound, while having a headset really sucks.

item.title: Ear ringing sound Effect - Fix possible in player.cpp
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
I would vote towards making it optional instead of removing it.
I like post-blast tinnitus as a detail. (I also miss the old HL2 “underwater” sound which was removed, I believe, around 2007.)

That said, apparently in DM it can linger after respawn, which is a bit of an issue. Haven’t run into the bug myself, but if it’s still an issue it needs to be looked at.
